mapper.select: select distinct chart.game_Id,title,price,cover_Path,discount,chart.CONSOLE_ID,CONSOLE_NAME,categories.CATE_ID,CATE_NAME from chart inner join games inner join played_on inner join consoles inner join belong inner join categories on chart.game_id=games.game_id and chart.game_id=played_on.game_id and chart.CONSOLE_ID=consoles.CONSOLE_ID and belong.GAME_ID=chart.GAME_ID and categories.CATE_ID=belong.CATE_ID order by games.GAME_ID desc asc where user_id=#{userId} limit #{startWith},#{endWith};
